tool_description: Segments customers into groups based on purchase behavior, demographics, and engagement history to optimize review request campaigns.

customer_ids.description: List of customer IDs to segment

segmentation_criteria.description: Criteria for segmentation: purchase_frequency, order_value, geography, age, previous_reviews, loyalty_status

min_segment_size.description: Minimum number of customers per segment

error_messages: Empty customer list: customer_ids array cannot be empty.
Invalid segmentation criteria: Use valid criteria from [purchase_frequency, order_value, geography, age, previous_reviews, loyalty_status].
Invalid segment count: segment_count must be between 2 and 10.
Insufficient data: Not enough customers to create the requested number of segments with minimum size requirements.
Invalid minimum segment size: min_segment_size must be at least 1.
usage: Provide customer IDs and segmentation criteria to group customers for targeted review campaigns. The tool creates distinct segments with customer characteristics.

segment_sizes.description: Number of customers in each segment

customer_segment_mapping.description: Mapping of customer IDs to their assigned segments
